item.title: picotool for RP2040
item.description: There are many RP2040 dev boards in the drawer. It is time to use them. $ brew install picotool $ picotool version picotool v1.1.2 (Darwin 23.0.0, AppleClang-15.0.0.15000040, Release) this is the easiest way to install it. Of course if you like you can build it on your own. Here is the repo of picotool. Below is the details of installing picotool. ==> Auto-updated Homebrew! Updated 3 taps (homebrew/bundle, homebrew/core and homebrew/cask).
